name: Blocky Superbikes Race Game | Free Cube City Moto Racing
name_original: Blocky Superbikes Race Game | Free Cube City Moto Racing
description:
This is the time to play Superbikes!

The racer can choose between 4 super fast motorcycles and drive around in block city!

It is one of the best night city racing experience in sandbox style environment!

Choose your machine and race in the streets of block city!

You can also use nitro in order to go very fast!
* Leader boards!
* Beautiful pixel art!
* Nitro!
* Simple controls!
* Addicting music!
* 4 different superbikes to ride with!

The race is starting!! Will you win ??!!

Follow us on Twitter: @bravocterogames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
